_header: Baker Bellamy / Ware thee from the pillory
_description: An amulet for a baker against the fever — two couplets

OxfBal228.Transcription:
Bakere belamiWar the fram the pilloriBut þu make goud
                    lofsent marie worth þe wroth
OxfBal228.Editions:
Coxe,  Henry Octavius. 
             Catalogus codicum mss. qui in collegiis aulisque
                oxoniensibus….
         Oxon: e Typographeo academico, 1852: 74.
